synopsis.text: As Narumi Momose embarks on her first day at a new job, she carries a secret identity as an otaku and fujoshi, a secret she's determined to keep hidden from her colleagues. But fate has other plans when she bumps into her childhood friend, Hirotaka Nifuji, who shares her passion for all things otaku, especially video games. After an impromptu reunion over drinks, Hirotaka proposes an unexpected solution to keep Narumi's secret safe: they should date. As they navigate their new relationship, the pair must figure out how to balance their shared otaku interests with the realities of a romantic relationship, all while keeping their secret from their coworkers. Will their love story level up, or will it be game over before it even begins? Join Narumi and Hirotaka as they embark on an adorably awkward journey of love, friendship, and fandom in this delightful anime.
